recommendations.message: Found 43 HIGH severity issues. Review overflow and preventDefault calls immediately.
Found 23 MEDIUM severity issues. Check position: fixed elements and body overflow management.
Verify ion-content is used on all pages and scroll-y is not disabled.
Test on real mobile device or emulator to verify touch scrolling works.
